insert into t_advertisement (id, name, time, order_time, location, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, url, target, is_use) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{location,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_advertisement set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location = #{location,jdbcType=TINYINT}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_resolution = #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_size = #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_format = #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, time, order_time, location, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, url, target, is_use from t_advertisement where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
